vn9_n.unit:
0=No education
1= Elementary school
2=Post-elementary school technician.
3=Middle school
4= Post-middle school technician
5= Commercial career
6= Technical career
7=High school
8=Post-high school technician
9=Undergraduate degree
10=Graduate degree

vn14.unit:
1=Soil (no floor)
2= Cement (no floor)
3= Tile (with floor)
4= Vynil/linoleum (with floor)
5=Carpet (with floor)
6=Other (with floor)

esc_amai.unit:
1=No education
2= Incomplete elementary school
3= Complete elementary school
4= Incomplete middle school
5= Complete middle school
6= Commercial career
7=Technical career
8= Incomplete high school
9= Complete high school
10= Incomplete undergraduate degree
11= Complete undergraduate degree
12= Diploma or Masterâ€™s degree
13=Doctorate degree
